ValidationRule.description: Before the Current Step can be changed to Onboarding Completed all open issues need to be resolved
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL(Current_Step__c, "Onboarding Complete")&& (ISPICKVAL(Submission_Type__c, "AOR") || ISPICKVAL(Submission_Type__c, "AOR and New Case"))&& ( Sox_Status_None_Count__c > 0 || ( (ISBLANK(Infopath_Received__c) || ISBLANK(Set_up_complete_email_received__c) || Policy_Type_Total_of_EEs__c < 1 || Carrier_Other_Count__c > 0) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must resolve any Open Items, Sales Submission items, InfoPath Received, Set up Complete email received and Policy items: Sox Status, Total # of EEs, and Carriers before the Current Step can be changed to Onboarding Complete
